channel.title: Finally made a server,But cant make my server owner,take a look
channel.description:
hey guys i finally made my server :D thanks to moparscape and the coders at moparscape. but i got a problem, i cant make my self an owner, i went to character-and opened my acc.txt (firas.txt)- and changed players rights-from 0 to 3 but it didnt work,iam using testscape source. take a look at the player rights(and ye i saved it) [IMG]http://i32.tinypic.com/6nroki.jpg[/img]
and take a look ,when i log in... i am not an owner or anything: [IMG]http://i27.tinypic.com/qxo3yu.jpg[/img]
and when i log in and then log out, and i reopen my acc.txt in character, the player rights =0.. its not saving i guess.
thanks :)

item.title: Finally made a server,But cant make my server owner,take a look
item.dc:creator: @Jordiescape Jordiescape
item.description:
@Jordiescape wrote:

Yes… But the reason this is occuring is server-sided.

Read full topic
item.source: Finally made a server,But cant make my server owner,take a look

item.title: Finally made a server,But cant make my server owner,take a look
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

Jordiescape:

This has nothing to do with client sided shit. The rights are resetting to 0, so obviously it’s server-sided.

The client has an array of 2 sprites. known as mod_icons. Now, for rights 1 and 2, it shows a silver and gold crown. Anything less OR MORE does not show a crown, unless you edit the client to do so.

Read full topic

item.title: Finally made a server,But cant make my server owner,take a look
item.dc:creator: @primadude Primadude
item.description:
@primadude wrote:

[quote=“iTanq, post:3, topic:294317”][quote author=Mitko link=topic=389280.msg2908132#msg2908132 date=1249923816]
Make sure you are offline when changing the player rights because when you save, the character file is still in use so it doesn’t get changed so when you log out it saves. (Bringing you back to player rights = 0)
[/quote]

Make sure you compile too lol[/quote]

You don’t need to compile; the text file will automatically save.

Read full topic

item.title: Finally made a server,But cant make my server owner,take a look
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

You may “own” one, But I’ve been working with them for almost 3 years. In ANY source, unless you edit the client, only rights 1 and 2 will show ANY sort of icon or crown. So until you edit the CLIENT and extend the sprite array to compensate for the other ranks, there will NOT be any other crowns.

Oh, and just so YOU know, the reason people believe that anything greater than 2 is owner, hidden owner, etc, is because back in the wL bases, the commands, and alot of the functions used the >= operator, which lead people to this question: What is greater than admin? Oh! owner!

Must I explain it again?

Read full topic
item.source: Finally made a server,But cant make my server owner,take a look

item.title: Finally made a server,But cant make my server owner,take a look
item.dc:creator: @twinky12341 twinky12341
item.description:
@twinky12341 wrote:

[quote=“zyle1992, post:13, topic:294317”]Seriously? Am I the only one that stills remmeber how 317’s work?

3 is hidden admin. You have admin powers, just no crown. Put it to 2 if you want a crown, and admin powers.[/quote]

your a retard i own a 317 1 = mod 2 = admin 3 = owner 4 = hidden owner 64 = hidden admin

Read full topic
